join.title: Join
join.description: Joins describe the SQL expression necessary to join two physical tables. Joins can be used when defining dimension columns that reference other tables.

name.title: Join name
name.description: The name of the join relationship.

to.title: Join table name
to.description: The name of the table that is being joined to

type.title: Type of Join
type.description: Type of the join - toOne or toMany

definition.title: Join definition SQL
definition.description: Templated SQL expression that represents the ON clause of the join

measure.title: Measure
measure.description: Metric definitions are extensible objects that contain a type field and one or more additional attributes. Each type is tied to logic in Elide that generates a metric function.

name.title: Metric name
name.description: The name of the metric. This will be the same as the POJO field name.

description.title: Metric description
description.description: A long description of the metric.

hidden.title: Hide/Show measure
hidden.description: Whether this metric is exposed via API metadata

type.title: Field type
type.description: The data type of the field

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: Dimensions represent labels for measures. Dimensions are used to filter and group measures.

name.title: Dimension name
name.description: The name of the dimension. This will be the same as the POJO field name.

description.title: Dimension description
description.description: A long description of the dimension.

hidden.title: Hide/Show dimension
hidden.description: Whether this dimension is exposed via API metadata

type.title: Dimension field type
type.description: The data type of the dimension field

tags.title: Dimension tags
tags.description: An array of string based tags for dimensions

name.title: Table Model Name
name.description: The name of the model. This will be the same as the POJO class name.

schema.title: Table Schema
schema.description: The database or schema where the model lives.

table.title: Table name
table.description: The physical table name where the model lives.

hidden.title: Hide/Show Table
hidden.description: Whether this table is exposed via API metadata

sql.title: Table SQL
sql.description: SQL query which is used to populate the table.

description.title: Table Model description
description.description: A long description of the model.

cardinality.title: Model cardinality
cardinality.description: The number of rows in the table: (tiny, small, medium, large, huge). The relative sizes are decided by the table designer(s).

joins.title: Table joins
joins.description: Describes SQL joins to other tables for column references.

tags.title: Table tags
tags.description: An array of string based tags
